section.title: Log Collector
section.para: A log collection tool is included in the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager. This allows you to easily collect relevant logs from across the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization environment when requesting support.

The log collection command is rhevm-log-collector. You are required to log in as the root user and provide the administration credentials for the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization environment. The rhevm-log-collector -h command displays usage information, including a list of all valid options for the rhevm-log-collector command.
